name: Honey Combs
description:
Step into the colourful world of Honey Combs!

Become a little and diligent bee and make higher scores than your friends!

Match 3 or more equally coloured honeycombs to success. The more honeycombs with the same colors you match, the more points you gain. Find and free the little bee behind the combs and unlock extra time!

Features
- Free gaming experience
- Match-3
- Fast-paced game for now and then

What do you think about this game?
Are you missing a feature or having an idea how to improve this game, leave me a comment. :)
